title: Ping will go up to 500 sometimes , I can only fix it when I restart computer
body: How can i fix the problem?  I use wifi. Dota gots some problem too for me...

replies.body: You may be having packet loss or some connection problem that's causing lag spikes like this.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) where you're seeing this happen for an analysis of what's going on.  Let me know what you find!
